issue.title: [CI] Consider re-adding the removed debian testing image
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7139](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7139). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I've removed the Debian-testing docker images, was not sure where did we run it. 
cc `[~kou]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7139?focusedCommentId=16972912) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We don't need to re-add Debian testing.
Debian testing we added is now Debian buster. We already have Debian buster image.
